backend/main.mo: Main backend canister implementing order creation, status updates, payment confirmation, and build status tracking with migration support.
backend/migration.mo: Migration module that upgrades old actor state to include lastBuildStatus while preserving orders and nextOrderId.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping feature IDs to related files, components, and test requirements.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON-style list of summaries describing major frontend components, utilities, and configuration files.
frontend/android/.gitkeep: Placeholder file to keep the Android platform directory in version control.
frontend/capacitor.config.ts: Capacitor configuration defining app ID, name, web output directory, and Android build options.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind-based CSS defining color variables, themes, and base styles for light and dark modes.
frontend/index.html: Main HTML entry point configuring meta tags, icons, PWA manifest, and loading the React app.
frontend/public/downloads/.gitkeep: Placeholder file preserving the downloads directory for APKs.
frontend/public/downloads/README.md: Documentation for storing, building, and deploying downloadable APK files in the public downloads folder.
frontend/public/manifest.webmanifest: PWA manifest defining app metadata, colors, icons, and display behavior.
frontend/README-android-apk.md: Guide explaining how to build an Android APK from the React app using Capacitor with prerequisites and steps.
frontend/scripts/predeploy-verify.sh: Script that runs the frontend build verification script and aborts deployment on failure.
frontend/scripts/retry-build-deploy.sh: Runs a full build and deploy sequence with logging and step-by-step execution using dfx commands.
frontend/scripts/verify-build.sh: Performs a full frontend build verification including static asset check, dependency install, type check, lint, and build.
frontend/scripts/verify-static-assets.sh: Checks that all required generated static assets exist before allowing a build or deploy.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app managing navigation, modals, order flow, admin mode, and APK download handling.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminApkDo: Button that checks availability of the admin APK and downloads it or shows an unavailable alert.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminDashb: Main admin dashboard showing stats, filters, orders, build/deploy status, owner settings, and logout controls.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminLogin: Modal for entering and validating a 4‑digit admin PIN to grant dashboard access.
frontend/src/components/admin/BuildDeplo: Panel displaying the latest build, installation, and deploy results with logs.
frontend/src/components/admin/OrderDetai: Side panel showing detailed order information and allowing status updates.
frontend/src/components/admin/OrdersFilt: UI filters for payment status and order status on the admin orders list.
frontend/src/components/admin/OrdersTabl: Table listing orders with key details, status badges, and a view-details action.
frontend/src/components/admin/OwnerSetti: Section exposing owner-level settings, including AdSense configuration.
frontend/src/components/ads/AdsHeadInjec: Injects the provider's head script at runtime when ads are enabled, rendering nothing.
frontend/src/components/ads/AdSlot.tsx: Renders an ad slot container and mounts/unmounts provider snippets based on runtime ads config.
frontend/src/components/ads/AdsSettingsP: Admin UI for configuring AdSense settings, validating input, and saving to localStorage.
frontend/src/components/OrderForm.tsx: Order form component allowing plate selection, quantity adjustment, validation, and order submission.
frontend/src/components/OwnerPhoto.tsx: Displays a founder photo with fallback behavior and configurable sizes.
frontend/src/components/PostOrderConfirm: Modal shown after an order enabling UPI payments, WhatsApp fallback links, and payment confirmation submission.
frontend/src/components/PromoPopup.tsx: Displays a timed promotional popup encouraging ordering, dismissible and session-persistent.
frontend/src/components/SimpleModal.tsx: Simple text modal with optional WhatsApp link and copy-to-clipboard support.
frontend/src/config/ads.ts: Defines ads config defaults and utilities to generate AdSense head and slot snippets.
frontend/src/config/apk.ts: Provides static APK metadata for customer and admin app downloads.
frontend/src/config/contact.ts: Stores centralized phone and location contact info.
frontend/src/config/footer.ts: Defines footer tagline, copyright text, and quick‑link navigation items.
frontend/src/config/ownerPhotos.ts: Lists public URLs for founder images with default selections.
frontend/src/config/payment.ts: Holds business UPI ID, delivery charge, and payment name constants.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages backend actor instances tied to Internet Identity and refreshes dependent queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useAdminAuthorization: Tracks admin authorization by monitoring URL hash and token presence.
frontend/src/hooks/useAdminOrders.ts: Fetches all orders for admin view when authorization and actor state are valid.
frontend/src/hooks/useAdsConfig.ts: Builds runtime ads config from stored settings, environment checks, and AdSense snippet generation.
frontend/src/hooks/useCreateOrder.ts: Provides a mutation to create backend orders and invalidate related queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Manages Internet Identity auth client, login state, identity loading, and context exposure.
frontend/src/hooks/useLastBuildStatus.ts: Queries backend for the most recent build/deploy status for admin diagnostics.
Provides a React Query mutation to update an order's status and invalidate admin order data.
frontend/src/hooks/useUpdatePaymentConfi: Implements a mutation to submit payment confirmation details and refresh order queries.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind CSS layers, theme variables, dark mode values, and animation utilities.
frontend/src/lib/adminAccess.ts: Handles admin PIN validation and URL-hash–based token management for admin access control.
frontend/src/lib/ads.ts: Safely injects third-party ad provider scripts and mounts or clears ad slot snippets.
frontend/src/lib/adsenseSnippet.ts: Extracts and validates AdSense client IDs from various snippet formats.
frontend/src/lib/adsOwnerSettings.ts: Manages AdSense settings in localStorage with validation and change notifications.
frontend/src/lib/apkAvailability.ts: Checks APK availability, retrieves size, and triggers downloads for customer and admin APKs.
frontend/src/lib/orderRules.ts: Defines minimum delivery order rules and related validation messages.
frontend/src/lib/runtimeEnvironment.ts: Detects whether the app is running in Capacitor or a standard web environment.
frontend/src/lib/upi.ts: Builds UPI payment links and attempts to open Paytm, Google Pay, or generic UPI apps.
frontend/src/lib/vpaValidation.ts: Validates UPI VPAs and rejects common placeholder patterns, with a helper error message.
frontend/src/lib/whatsapp.ts: Provides helpers to build WhatsApp deep links with pre-filled order, payment, and screenshot messages, plus functions to open them in a new tab.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and an Internet Identity provider.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom colors, animations, plugins, and container settings.
frontend/tsconfig.node.json: TypeScript config for Node-side tooling, enabling strict mode and ESNext modules for vite config.
frontend/vite.config.ts: Vite config setting up React plugin, env injection, aliases, dev server proxy, build options, and global definition.
project_state.json: Stores project metadata, issues, and existing features related to diagnosing and fixing deployment errors.
